name: Remaining Light
description:
This is a little prototype about light and darkness. 

You are playing as the darkness that devourer the parts that are missing, the light. The project changed a lot over the time of the game jam. My partner just started to learn game art and made all the artworks herself. 

As a game, it is not done. You can simply move around with WASD and bump into the light, if you are strong enough you, devourer it and eat light for light until you are big enough to take on even bigger lights. 

It's not done, but making it was really fun :).
